name: Danger of the Violent Woods
description:
What lurks beneath the trees of violent woods?

Are you brave enough to face the infamous monsters such as Jarmo-daddy-longlegs and Sluippi Urho?

Danger of the violent woods is a combination of Action rpg And Arcade-minigame-like battles

Game also includes the whole 9-song soundtrack! (which was done in a hurry in less than an hour)

Enter the violent woods, find the missing pieces and pet that hedgehog…

(The game was made for LudumDare 41 within 48 hours)
